original_text: When the men of the town rose early in the morning, behold, the altar of Baal was broken down, and the Asherah beside it was cut down, and the second bull was offered on the altar that had been built.
korean_text: 그 성읍 사람들이 아침에 일찍이 일어나 본즉 바알의 제단이 파괴되었으며 그 곁의 아세라가 찍혔고 새로 쌓은 제단 위에 그 둘째 수소를 드렸는지라

sentences.original_text: When the men of the town rose early in the morning
sentences.korean_translation: 성읍 사람들이 아침 일찍 일어났을 때,

sentences.original_text: behold, the altar of Baal was broken down
the Asherah beside it was cut down
sentences.korean_translation: 그 곁의 아세라 상이 찍혀 있었으며,

sentences.original_text: the second bull was offered on the altar that had been built.
sentences.korean_translation: 두 번째 수소가 세워진 제단 위에 드려졌다.
